The video in question is a 2013 student: not a recent event related to the Gaza border protests or any other claimed context.
The video was originally shared on the Y: an Egyptian news outlet, and was not produced or disseminated by any Palestinian or Hamas source.
The video captures a: die-in" protest staged by students at Cairo's Al-Azhar University, where they were protesting against what they called a "military coup" that toppled Islamist president Mohamed Morsi.
The video has been repeatedly shared out: including staged funerals, crisis actors in a chemical attack, and Hamas propaganda depicting faked civilian deaths.
